posts.name: Max Morehead
posts.cooked: You should be able to open the driver station and see which button number is activated when you click those buttons. Then you can use getRawButton or similar WPILib functions to get the corresponding button in code.

posts.name: Sean Paxman I 9191
posts.cooked: I believe these buttons are not available on driver station by default, download the software for the controller and rebind r4 and l4 to buttons you wont use such as the dpad.

posts.name: Burak Şükür
posts.cooked:
I believe this controller is Gamesir G7 SE and i found this tutorial on their website.

Set R4/L4 button value: Hold the M+R4/L4 buttons simultaneously for 3s. When the indicator blinks slowly, tap the button you want to map to R4/L4. The indicator turns solid to indicate L4/R4 button value is set.

Set R4/L4 button value: Hold the M+R4/L4 buttons simultaneously for 3s. When the indicator blinks slowly, tap the button you want to map to R4/L4. The indicator turns solid to indicate L4/R4 button value is set.

Cancel R4/L4 button value: Hold the M+R4/L4 buttons simultaneously for 3s. When the indicator blinks slowly, tap R4/L4 button. The indicator turns solid to indicate L4/R4 button value is canceled.

Cancel R4/L4 button value: Hold the M+R4/L4 buttons simultaneously for 3s. When the indicator blinks slowly, tap R4/L4 button. The indicator turns solid to indicate L4/R4 button value is canceled.

posts.name: Ada T
posts.cooked: Puedes asignarlos para que actúen como un botón diferente en el control, pero luego simplemente los usas en tu código como si fueran ese botón.
